title:
Tuning towards the edge of a dark abyss: Implications of a tuning
  paradigm on the hierarchy between the weak and dark matter scales
authors: Christopher D. Carone, Noah L. Donald
abstract:
It has recently been suggested that tuning towards the boundary of the
positivity domain of the scalar potential may explain the separation between
the electroweak scale and the unification scale in a grand unified theory. Here
we explore the possibility that the same type of tuning might account for the
generation of the electroweak scale from a much lighter dynamically generated
scale in a dark sector. We present a model that realizes this idea and provides
a proof of principle that the same dark sector can include a viable dark matter
candidate.
